questionTitle: The house is ________ at the corner of a busy street.
If I were you I ________ go to the doctor tomorrow.
The new factory chimney was ________ than all the trees around it.
The police ________ me $12 for parking at a bus-stop.
Her parents were very ________ because she was out so late that night.
You may not have to stay the night but take a toothbrush just in ________.
"The answer ________ higher employment is a greater production," the economist said.
We meet for lunch ________ every Friday.
On the ________ to the town there is a beautiful wood.
I'm afraid that we don't have any ________ sizes in stock, madam.
The patient ________ to listen to his doctor's advice.
Children with ________ diseases should not be allowed to go to school.
________ ten minutes of the start of the game two players had been sent off.
It happened ________ we were asleep last Friday night.
It is obvious ________ everyone that he is not responsible for this mistake.
His ________ for his loyal support of the party was a seat in the Cabinet.
What a mess! The papers need ________.
I hope his work ________ by next Monday.
I don't know the answer myself but I'll ________ around and see if anybody else knows.
I thought the way you behaved was ________ outrageous.
